overview:
Keith is currently the VP of Sales and Marketing for ShareFile.

He is a Senior Sales Exec with over 20 years of successful managerial and individual contributor roles. Specialist in strategic planning, organization optimization, business development and customer retention. Focus in telecom and technology industries. Developed and managed geographically dispearsed sales teams. Improved customer retention while exceeding a $300MM quota.

Previous companies include: LiveCargo, Inc., Qwest Communications and Interpath Communications.
